sen.j: 中村 扇雀（なかむら せんじゃく）は、中村鴈治郎家所縁の名跡の一つ。
sen.e: Senjaku NAKAMURA is one of professional names that are connected to the Ganjiro NAKAMURA family.
Senjaku NAKAMURA is one of the professional names that are related to the Ganjiro NAKAMURA family.
sen.cmt: the を挿入しました。connected→related と修正しました。
sen.e: Senjaku NAKAMURA is one of the professional names that are related to the Ganjiro NAKAMURA family.
Senjaku NAKAMURA (the first)
Senjaku NAKAMURA (the first)
Senjaku NAKAMURA (the first)

sen.j: 中村鴈治郎 (2代目)の前々名。
sen.e: Ex-ex name of Ganjiro NAKAMURA (the second).
The name before last of Ganjiro NAKAMURA (the second).
sen.cmt: Ex-ex name→The name before last と修正しました。
sen.e: The name before last of Ganjiro NAKAMURA (the second).
Senjaku NAKAMURA (the second)
Senjaku NAKAMURA (the second)
Senjaku NAKAMURA (the second)

sen.j: 初代の子坂田藤十郎 (4代目)の前々名。
sen.e: Ex-ex name of Tojuro SAKATA (the fourth), a son of the first.
The name before last of Tojuro SAKATA (the fourth), a son of the first Senjaku NAKAMURA.
sen.cmt: Ex-ex name→The name before last と修正しました。Senjaku NAKAMURA を補いました。
sen.e: The name before last of Tojuro SAKATA (the fourth), a son of the first Senjaku NAKAMURA.
Senjaku NAKAMURA (the third)
Senjaku NAKAMURA (the third)
Senjaku NAKAMURA (the third)
The second son of the second.
The second son of the second Senjaku NAKAMURA.
sen.cmt: Senjaku NAKAMURA を補いました。
sen.e: The second son of the second Senjaku NAKAMURA.
